data.text: Wise women [PRS] hold their families together by the wise things that they do,
By continually behaving/acting righteously, people show that they greatly revere Yahweh;
Foolish people will be punished [MTY] for what they say,
If a man has no oxen to plow his field, he does not need to put grain in their feedbox,
Witnesses who are reliable always say what ◄is true/really happened►,
Those who make fun of being wise will never become wise,
Stay away from foolish people,
Those who have good sense are wise, so they know what they should do and what they should not do;
Foolish people make fun of their committing sins;
If you are very sad or if you are joyful, only you know what you are experiencing;
Houses built by wicked people will be destroyed,
There are some kinds of behavior [MET] that some people falsely think are right,
Sometimes when people laugh, they are really sad,
Those who stubbornly continue to do what is wrong will get what they deserve,
Foolish people believe everything that people tell them;
Wise people are careful and avoid doing things that will give them trouble;
Those who quickly become angry [IDM] do foolish things;
Foolish people get what they deserve for doing foolish things;
Some day evil people will bow down in front of righteous people to show that they respect them;
No one likes poor people; even their friends/neighbors do not like them;
It is sinful to despise your poor neighbors;
Those who plan to do things that are evil/wrong are walking on the wrong road;
If you work hard, you will ◄accomplish something good/get a good income►,
One of the rewards [MET] of being wise is to become rich;
By saying in court what is true, you can save the life of the one who is being falsely accused;
Those who revere Yahweh are confident that he will protect them,
Having an awesome respect for Yahweh is like [MET] having a fountain that gives life;
If a king rules over many people, many people will be able to honor him;
Those who do not quickly become angry are very wise;
Having a mind that is peaceful results in having a healthy body;
Those who oppress poor people are insulting God, the one who made those poor people,
Wicked people ruin themselves by the evil things that they do,
Those who have good sense always think what is wise;
When the people of a nation continually act righteously, it causes that nation to be great;
Kings are pleased with officials who do their work competently/skillfully,
